Is there anyone on there that is not as stupid as me. can someone tell me where to extract from and with what?

1) Download and install WinRAR
2) Right-click on the file "teneke.part01.rar" and chose "Extract Here".
3) Wait about 5 mins while it unpacks.

You should now have an ISO file thats about 3.96GB.

The crack works fine, under xp 64bit version, to get this game to work under the 32 bit version via AGP chipsets, all you have to do is goto into your device manager, and update the VIA AGP to CPU controller under system devices, with via hyperion driver 5.10a agp driver, ViA AGP 2.0/3.0 to CPU Controller, then the game will work fine.

Ok ill make it simple for those who cant do this..

1. Rename the file called "rzr-nfsc.001" to 
"rzr-nfsc.001.rar"

2. Right click "extract here" it over "rzr-nfsc.002"
and a file will popup.

3. When the file comes up then choose the file called rzr-nfsc.002.

4. A .iso file will start to come up in a new map that's made.

5. When it's done (might take up to 5 min) open it with DeamonTools and write in this serial: "SA44-7ZGD-U6N4-N4W3-1911".

6. When you're done then download a crack from "www.Google.com" and install it.

7. GOOD LUCK AND HAVE FUN.

[SuperCrackersTeam SCT 2005]
